title: Support is unplayable now!
body: Playing pre-season and support role is so poor and unplayable. How to counter this?

replies.body: Unplayable is too much. It's simply not as versatile as it was before. However, it's pre-season and the meta is evershifting. Unless you're in competitive matches, everything is viable.

currently meta supports are high poke/engage like senna or counters to them like leona and thresh. since you don't need to pay like 500 gold to upgrade your support item, it opens up possibilities into more early itemization you can do on your first back, try and figure that out and go from there
I should have said that as support it is impossible now to ward properly as there are too many places to hide. Money items area an issue too. Seems earning far less then before the patches.

learn geometry (teasing a bit, not mocking), notice your enemies/allies habits, and ward the edge of bushes for more area sight silly :l e.g oh look a triway footpath, lets ward the most shrouded path that doesn't get much sight since my team's actually helping ward and not keeping wards 2/2 for over 8min or ward every way in that doesn't have constant sight if they aren't helping and they're nearby. It only earns less if you cs as support because then you're taking gold from allies that are nearby who can get full gold (cs while nobody's near for AGES, I think it turns off after full gold which is greatly fair), I like getting them after laning or during still though if enemies fed us enough (e.g gold from turrets and harassing between fights, and csing to push). Not too sure about the new rune, feels random and that extra income item, I haven't checked whether it turns into a different enough item or specifically just for a role

'unplayable' 
or, different? its stronger than before for many. c'mon grow up a lil and take some time before posting in the boards

I've found with the new support, the strong champs are the Mage/Enchanter/Playmaker Supports

Picking Karma, Morganna, Nami, Soraka, etc. tends to void this, plus picking playmaker supports like Pyke and Thresh allows you to utilise the alcove

Alternatively, pick cheese supports, like Pantheon, J4, Lee, etc. they tend to be quite useful as the support meta right now is open to interpretation, just don't Int and you should be alright, if your ADC complains, just mute them and play well (or to the best of your ability)
